sentences.cn: 他用竖琴演奏了一首爱尔兰曲调.

sentences.en: He sat down on a block of stone and tuned his harp.
sentences.cn: 他坐在一块大石头上,弹起他的竖琴来.

sentences.en: I never learned how to tune a harp, or play upon a lute; but I know how to raise a small and obscure city to glory and greatness...where to all kindreds of the earth will pilgrim.
sentences.cn: 我从未学习过如何为竖琴调弦，也不知如何弹奏鲁特琴。 但我懂得如何使一座偏僻的无名小镇发展成辉煌而伟大的城市，使世界各国的子民前来朝圣。

sentences.en: If the note of D is sounded on a harp, all the corresponding D strings of other octaves will likewise resonate.
sentences.cn: 如果用竖琴演奏D音符，其他八度音阶所有相应的D弦都将发出共鸣。

sentences.en: She began to harp us to drink after dinner.
sentences.cn: 用餐后，她开始弹奏起竖琴让我们饮酒消食。

sentences.en: She continued to harp on the theme of her wasted life.
sentences.cn: 她继续大讲她那虚度了的一生.

sentences.en: She swept her fingers over the strings of the harp.
sentences.cn: 她用手指划过竖琴的琴弦.

sentences.en: She's a wizard at playing harp.
Some of the instrumentation is exquisite, particularly for harp and flute.
sentences.cn: 有些器乐段落谱写得非常优美，尤其是竖琴和长笛的部分。

sentences.en: The girl is sitting on the chair, playing the harp.
sentences.cn: 女孩正坐在椅子上弹扬琴.

sentences.en: The harp has a very large repertoire.

sentences.en: The introduction presents arpeggios on the harp against a string tremolo -- an enchanting sonority.
sentences.cn: 引子,在弦乐的震音上竖琴奏出了琶音,一种迷人的音响.
他们的竖琴就是通行证.

sentences.en: This is a small harp and a home-made rattle fashioned from a tin that once contained food aid.
